caption.p: Basic composition of edible parts of the egg. ( a) Egg white; ( b) Egg yolk. Note that for ( b), results refer to egg yolk/vitelline membrane complex. Retrieved on 01/11/2019 from the Ciqual homepage https://ciqual.anses.fr/ (French Agency for Food, Environmental and Occupational Health & Safety. ANSES-CIQUAL).
